title: In Love with a Ruthless, Calloused Billionaire 1: Hiring Ms. Divorced
description: Hazel Norris had sworn off relationships—and men. After divorcing her ex-husband (after finding out he cheated) she was determined to stand-up on her own two feet and become the independent woman she needed to be. And that required finding a job. Taking up the role as the billionaire executive Dante Santino’s secretary; Hazel was not prepared to find a sizzling passion that ignited between them. She was more than willing to ignore the spark; but her boss seemed to have a different perspective because he suddenly had an urge to possess her!
author: Aubrey A. Monroe
